title: Night Log Habit
description: Track observations with quick notes and build a consistent skywatching routine.
tldr: Capture date, weather, and what you saw. Small notes make patterns easier to spot over time.

sections.title: Log essentials
sections.body: Write the date, time, weather, and targets observed. Keep it short so you stay consistent.

sections.title: Pattern spotting
sections.body: Look for patterns in visibility or clarity. This helps you choose the best nights.

sections.title: Weekly review
sections.body: Review your notes weekly to reinforce what you learned.

quiz.question: What should you record first?
quiz.explanation: Start with the basics to keep the log reliable.

quiz.question: Why keep notes short?
quiz.explanation: Short notes help you maintain the habit.
